Package minet.data

Class Dataset<Tin,Tout>

java.lang.Object
minet.data.Dataset<Tin,Tout>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MNISTDataset
public abstract class Dataset<Tin,Tout> extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract class for all Dataset classes. Each child class has to specify Tin (type of input) and Tout (type of output).
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Dataset

      public Dataset(int batchsize, boolean shuffle, Random rnd)
      Constructor for Dataset
      Parameters:
      batchsize - (int) size of each mini-batch
      shuffle - (boolean) if true, shuffle the dataset at the beginning of each epoch
      rnd - (java.util.Random) random generator for the shuffling
